title: Provides for mandatory revocation of drivers license for certain convictions under the penal law
summary: Provides for the mandatory revocation of a driver's license for certain convictions under the penal law, followed by a period of one year of operating with a probationary license; such license would permit operation of a vehicle for employment, education, medical and dental purposes only.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to revocation of licenses in certain cases
